about_the_game:
This free patch adds 18+ content to The Language of Love, including:

  • One uncensored sex scene
  • Two new CGs
  • About 4,000 words of new text

Requires the base game, The Language of Love, to download.

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC unlocks a sex scene at the end of the story, which is described in some detail.
It also uncensors the bath CG, so it shows Kyouko's nipples.
